Which is your most "annoying" recipe???
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Which is your most "annoying" recipe???
By El Cheto on Wednesday, July 17, 2002 - 10:10 pm:

With annoying, I mean a recipe that always wins to a tie, and don't let other players play!

I'll show you mine:

I use Suezo, Mew, and Pixie, and my cards are:

Suezo:
1 spit
1 teleport
1 tail slap
1 bite
1 tongue
2 kiss
2 lick
2 scouting
3 side roll

Mew:
1 punch
1 head butt
1 hundred blows
1 diving press
3 miaow
1 zap
2 doll
2 tolerant cat
3 scaredy cat

Pixie:
1 kick
1 charge
1 lightning
3 kiss
1 enchant
1 recover
3 step
2 soar

Any monster:
1 dodge

Breeder:
1 cool judge (eliminates "ENV" cards")
1 nice fight
2 busy time
2 lock tight
1 pray

Try this team and have fun looking at your opponents' face, when they ran out of cards, or GUTS! Hehehe.

By El Cheto on Wednesday, July 17, 2002 - 10:23 pm:

Oh by the way, this is my team for Rank A tournaments. I haven't ever lost a match. Let's say it is an "Anti-Nelson", "Anti-Stolatos" and "Anti-Espada" team (which are always the same opponents to defeat in these tournaments)

By Green Reaper on Thursday, July 18, 2002 - 06:43 pm:

i've faced sephore totti and holly in the A-class tourny's too so be prepared if you don't want to face them with that kind of deck.

By El Cheto on Thursday, July 25, 2002 - 09:45 pm:

Yup, I've faced them too. No problem at all! If you keep Totti without guts, or with "Lock tight" he'll be innofensive. Sephore, well, just K.O. his Dino and he is nothing. Thanks for the advice anyway :)
